mapper.select: SELECT e.com_id, name, e.com_name, subs_start, subs_expiration, FLOOR(subs_expiration - sysdate) AS remaining, tel, email, address, bus_tel, subs_expiration, ( SELECT const_image FROM erpSubs WHERE subs_code = ( SELECT MIN(subs_code) FROM erpSubs WHERE com_id = e.com_id ) ) AS const_image, subs_type, subs_term, option_code FROM erpUser e LEFT JOIN erpSubs s ON (e.com_id = s.com_id) WHERE subs_expiration = ( SELECT MAX(s2.subs_expiration) FROM erpSubs s2 WHERE s2.com_id = e.com_id ) OR subs_expiration IS NULL

SELECT SUBS_CODE, SUBS_TYPE, SUBS_EXPIRATION, SUBS_START, SUBS_TERM, SUBS_PRICE, SUBS_QUANTITY, SUBS_STATE, COM_ID, OPTION_CODE, BILLING_KEY, CONST_IMAGE FROM erpSubs WHERE com_id =#{comId} ORDER BY subs_code DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'subs_' || (NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(subs_code,6))),100)+1) FROM erpSubs
INSERT INTO erpsubs(subs_code, subs_expiration, subs_start, subs_term, subs_price, subs_quantity, option_code, com_id, subs_type, subs_state) VALUES(#{subsCode}, sysdate+#{subsTerm}, sysdate, #{subsTerm}, #{subsPrice}, #{subsQuantity}, #{optionCode}, #{comId}, 'S02', 'C02')
mapper.update: UPDATE erpUser SET name=#{name}, tel=#{tel}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, bus_tel=#{busTel} WHERE com_id = #{comId}
UPDATE erpSubs SET subs_expiration=#{subsExpiration}, subs_start = #{subsStart}, subs_term=#{subsTerm}, com_id=#{comId}, option_code=#{optionCode} WHERE subs_code = #{subsCode}
